elements.name: user searches products with RS Stock No

steps.name: user is on RS Components website landing page
user enters RS Stock No in the quick order text box
user clicks on button Add to Basket
user should see his item in the basket summary page

elements.name: user search for products by applying filters

steps.name: user is on RS Components website landing page
user clicks on All Products tab
user selects connectors from the dropdown list
user clicks on Audio and Video connectors
user clicks on HDMI connectors from categories

steps.name: user narrows search by applying filter based on brand
user selects Molex brand and click apply filters button
user should see products by the applied filters

elements.name: user enter incorrect data or part numbers

user enter part numbers in the search text box
